env.info: (hold 0) (plate 17) (at 0 1) (sort 1 human) (size 1 big) (at 1 2) (sort 2 bed) (size 2 big) (at 2 2) (sort 3 desk) (size 3 big) (at 3 3) (sort 4 chair) (size 4 big) (at 4 4) (sort 5 refrigerator) (size 5 big) (at 5 5) (type 5 container) (sort 6 closet) (size 6 big) (at 6 6) (type 6 container) (closed 6) (sort 7 television) (size 7 big) (at 7 7) (sort 8 microwave) (size 8 big) (at 8 8) (type 8 container) (sort 9 teapoy) (size 9 big) (at 9 9) (sort 10 couch) (size 10 big) (at 10 10) (sort 11 sofa) (size 11 big) (at 11 11) (sort 12 cupboard) (size 12 big) (at 12 12) (type 12 container) (opened 12) (sort 13 airconditioner) (size 13 big) (at 13 13) (sort 14 washmachine) (size 14 big) (at 14 14) (type 14 container) (opened 14) (sort 15 book) (size 15 small) (color 15 yellow) (sort 16 book) (size 16 small) (color 16 green) (sort 17 book) (size 17 small) (color 17 white) (sort 18 bottle) (size 18 small) (color 18 green) (at 18 2) (sort 19 bottle) (size 19 small) (color 19 blue) (sort 20 bottle) (size 20 small) (color 20 yellow) (at 20 3) (sort 21 cup) (size 21 small) (color 21 white) (sort 22 remotecontrol) (size 22 small) (sort 23 can) (size 23 small) (color 19 blue) (inside 23 5) (sort 24 can) (size 24 small) (color 20 yellow)

test.instr: (:ins (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X refrigerator))) (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X microwave))) (:info (inside X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (sort Y washmachine))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (sort Y bed))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X white) (sort Y cupboard))) (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (sort Y washmachine))) (:task (give human X) (:cond (sort X book))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X green) (sort Y desk))) )
test.nl:
The refrigerator is closed. The microwave is opened. The remotecontrol is in washmachine. Put a can on bed. Put the book which is white in cupboard. Take out the remotecontrol from washmachine. Give human a book. Put the green book on desk.
Take out the blue can from the refrigerator. Put the yellow book in the cupboard. Put the yellow can on the desk.
